website_summaries.verdict: Figurines are very small in size, but appealing to younger Star Wars fans. Sets are collectible, and individual characters are sold separately.
pros: Figures are articulated, not stiff plastic
Every character has a weapon for "combat" play
cons: Set may not include advertised characters

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment! Great quality toy!
customer_reviews.text: Great assortment of all the Star Wars action figures to add to our Galactic Heroes play sets! The boys were thrilled with them all! The Galactic Heroes toys are sturdy, durable, well-made and have great details. My boys, ages, 6, 8, 10, and 12, all LOVE LOVE LOVE these toys.
customer_reviews.author: C. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Super fun.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint with the Playskool heroes toys is that the same characters are in multiple sets. We have 2 Black outfit Lukes and 3 Darth Vaders. But the toys hold up, easy for my little 4 y/o to manipulate and play with and they're super easy for him to stand and pose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kids Under 7!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect set for our budding 6-year old Star Wars aficionado. Just the right size for little hands, but still great detail on the cartoon-styled characters. PROS: -articulated -no loose pieces -nice detail. CONS: -no finn! TIP: this size character makes a great board pieces for other games. We use them in this game.
customer_reviews.author: lo_fer

customer_reviews.title: Better late than never
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time receiving my item. I’m not sure who’s fault, I can’t take the time to find out. It could have been amazon or the shipping, it it took almost a month to get it. However after complaining. The product itself looks great and what I expected. My grandson will love it, even if it was a late Christmas/ BIRTHDAY present.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi1320

customer_reviews.title: Star Wars Fanatics
customer_reviews.text: My sons were very excited to add a couple of new characters to their collection. These seem to be made of a bit cheaper plastic than all of the others we have. I think they'll be fine but they're noticeably different to the touch and bending their arms and waist. Time will tell on if they survive play like the others have. That being said so far they're great!
customer_reviews.author: Mselander

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Toys for Younger Star Wars Fans
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my nephews (3 and 4) and they loved them. They have been slowly getting into Star Wars and these are definitely great toys for that age group. They are smaller than some of the more traditional action figures for older kids and a little more playful than realistic looking. My nephews are pretty rough with everything and I have a feeling these will last a long time as the plastic felt sturdy. My sister also purchased the millennium falcon for each of them. Now with these characters, they have quite a blast stuffing the ship full of characters. Overall a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Great Star Wars set for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of characters. I wish Palpatine didn’t have a saber, since we know him best as using force lightning. And my son wishes it came with threepio, but overall we’ve had lots of fun with this toy! I love the durability of inaginext, so I guess my only complaint is there aren’t more sets! :) He’s 6 and loves the size of these characters
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Preschoolers and Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: We got these for my preschooler for Christmas who is dying to play with his brothers Star Wars minifigures but just cant quite manage them yet. These are perfect preschooler /toddler sized. No small parts for choking on. They are colorful and detailed. The characters look more friendly in their expressions then the typical star wars figures you see. Smiling etc. so for sensitive kids that is a plus. I suspect that my older son is now going to be begging my preschooler to play with his Star Wars figures for a change!
customer_reviews.author: mommyandwife

customer_reviews.title: My kids love them!!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old and 6 year old are really into Star Wars Legos. I knew they would like these because they are Star Wars characters, but I wasn't sure how they would stack up to Legos in the kids' minds. However they didn't stop playing with these figures for at least a week. Really nicely made!
customer_reviews.author: Doriath19

customer_reviews.title: Nice action figures
customer_reviews.text: These are small, but really nice quality. I run an after school program. I let 5 to 10 year old children play with them. They really seem to enjoy them. I felt like it was a really good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Three year old loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My three year old loves these. Had first purchased marvel characters and he played with them daily, so we added star wars to the collection. We have had both sets for more than 6 months with daily use and no broken pieces or issues.
customer_reviews.author: Superhero Lover

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy, well constructed
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old LOVES these! Perfect size for his little hands and he loves to put them in his backpack. Great assortment of Star Wars characters though Han Solo would have been a good one to have. All in all great for little guys (and girls!)
customer_reviews.author: RChambers

customer_reviews.title: Most important addition you make to your collection.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to finish my 1/2 acre diorama. Seven years of hard work and the complete battle scene, is complete! So stoked! My sister thought I was crazy but now she’s going to just be jealous! People will write stories of this depiction for years! I will finally get the praise I derserve!
customer_reviews.author: Strawleyder

customer_reviews.title: Durable toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter asked for Star Wars toys for Xmas. These looked sturdy and more kid friendly than some of the other Star Wars action figures. No review on durability yet, but they look like they can withstand heavy play. Excited to give them to her for Xmas.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, such cool looking toys
customer_reviews.text: Such cool toys. These are excellent quality, good size ( not too large or too small) and the detail is awesome. Can't wait to give these to my kids!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Seegmiller

customer_reviews.title: Yes, so many figures!!
customer_reviews.text: This set is so AWESOME!!! My 6 yr old has loved imaginext figures since he was 2. But this star wars set comes with so many figures its such a great deal and a great set to find! He was so surprised to see so many cool characters all in one box! And i was excited about the price. Best Christmas gift ever!
customer_reviews.author: samspoofyorganics

customer_reviews.title: Cutest things ever
customer_reviews.text: If you have Star Wars fans in the house, get these action figures! They are adorable and get a lot of use by my 5 and 9 year old boys. Great for imaginative play.
customer_reviews.author: CLTmom

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids who are rough with toys
customer_reviews.text: My Star Wars obsessed son loves these little guys. These are the best Star Wars toys he owns because they are extremely durable. He breaks the light sabers on every other Star Wars toy. These light sabers do not come off, so he is able to battle fight all day with no tears. I love the other sets; his favorite is the millennium falcon.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Star Wars Galactic Heroes
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with Star Wars, especially the Galactic Heroes series. Kids of all ages & their parents will have hours of fun playing with these figures.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it. Quality plastics and rubber
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Quality plastics and rubber, parts move well, and characters are detailed. It loses 1 star for the price, and another for the packaging. It took 15 minutes to cut apart all of the strings holding the characters together.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately Darth Vader’s cape broke off within the first few weeks. I was able to see it back, though. Other than that a great product! My son loves the figurines and they were a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Natali

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: Great for small children. 4 and 5 year old grandkids love these and star wars glactic heros play sets.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: Rivals set not found on other sites. We have never found some of the Star Wars figures sold separately. The grandkids LOVE them. Reasonable price and hours of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Debra R. Huff

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: We have seen this at other stores very expensive bought it for christmas pretty cheap and my kids loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas present so it hasn’t been opened yet, but it looks awesome! My son is going to LOVE it! It has hard to find characters like general grievous, and emporer palpatine whom my son absolutely must have!
customer_reviews.author: vptamm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for young kids into star wars
customer_reviews.text: 4 year old loves these figures. Just the right size and durable enough for his play. Realistic enough despite a stocky look to the characters.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Great Star Wars gift!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these!! I’ve purchased two set so far and they’re well made and a perfect gift for any child that loves Star Wars !
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and perfect for hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: My boys are 3 and 7 and play with these all day long. Good quality and perfect for hours of fun. We also have the Millennium Falcon and two of the x-wing fighters. They are the preferred toys in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price.
customer_reviews.text: Son loved for Christmas gift. He loves little action figures small but super durable
customer_reviews.author: Ashley deBoer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These action figures are a great value! I like how the light savers don’t detach that’s one less thing to worry about picking off the ground!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves them. I love that no little parts come off. The sabers are fixed. The characters move freely and you can stand them. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Very cool.
customer_reviews.text: I posed these on top of the cupcakes at my twins' birthday party. They were really fun, and the kids were excited to get them. Have you ever seen a chocolate frosting-coated stormtrooper with only its head sticking out of a child's mouth? I have.
customer_reviews.author: KayCeeOh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was brand new and looked nice. My son has been asking for these characters for a long time. So happy to find them.
customer_reviews.author: Rikki

customer_reviews.title: the kids fight over this so i may get another ...
customer_reviews.text: the kids fight over this so i may get another pack. My kids don't get a lot of screen time so they use their imagination a lot and figures help. These are high quality

customer_reviews.text: My son is a big Star Wars fan these little mini action figures really made his birthday very special he had fun playing with each and every one of these figures and treasures them highly

customer_reviews.title: Great for little Star Wars fans!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. I love the variety of characters and the small size works well for his little toddler hands. These are a must have for any little Star Wars fan!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves em
customer_reviews.text: You can’t take the weapons out of their hands, and a few of the faces are slightly misaligned. But that doesn't seem to bother my kid. He loves them.

customer_reviews.title: Great present!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. My son plays with them all of the time, unlike other toys that he played with when he first received them, but then lost interest. He acts out scenes for hours. I'd recommend these for any little Star Wars fan!

customer_reviews.title: I would use them again.

customer_reviews.title: Great Star Wars action figures
customer_reviews.text: My six year old son has been playing with these regularly for a few weeks since he got them. He really likes that each action figure has its own light saber or gun and that their arms move so they can fight with the other figures.

product_meta.title: Star Wars Galactic Heroes Galactic Rivals Action Figure
product_meta.description:
Young Jedi can take adventures into their own hands with 10 Star Wars Galactic Heroes figures! This set includes Luke Skywalker, Darth Vader, Rey, Kylo Ren, Yoda, Emperor Palpatine, Chewbacca, Stormtrooper, Obi-Wan Kenobi, and General Grievous figures. Help the Star Wars heroes defeat the Dark Side in epic match-ups, or set off to explore intergalactic mysteries! What mission will young Jedi come up with next? The adventure is up to them! Star Wars products are produced by Hasbro under license from Lucasfilm Ltd. Hasbro, Playskool, and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.

BRAND STORY
By Star Wars
feature_bullets: Includes Luke Skywalker, Darth Vader, Rey (Resistance Outfit), Kylo Ren, Yoda, Emperor Palpatine, Chewbacca, Stormtrooper, Obi-Wan Kenobi, and General Grievous figures

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars939 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
